code: import _classCallCheck from"/Users/fer/ironhack/week_8/jakku/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import axios from"axios";var AuthService=function AuthService(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,AuthService);this.signup=function(username,password){return _this.service.post("/signup",{username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.login=function(username,password){return _this.service.post("/login",{username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.loggedin=function(){return _this.service.get("/currentUser").then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.logout=function(){return _this.service.get("/logout").then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.googleauth=function(username,password){return _this.service.get("/auth/google",{username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.service=axios.create({baseURL:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL),withCredentials:true});};export default AuthService;
